blog.name: tyrus-is-endgame-no-doubt
blog.title: Tyrus Is Endgame
blog.description:
Tyrus is endgame and If it's not I'm suing
Tyrus, Muffy, and Ambi all own me

https://www.wattpad.com/user/Anti-Social_Person

summary: Don't Imagine 3x13
body:
Don’t Imagine 3x13

Don’t imagine Tj going home that day, regretting everything he has done to cyrus and putting himself down

Don’t imagine cyrus coming home and ignoring all his family and going straight to his room, shutting the door close and starts to cry for hours until he has no more tears left to cry

Don’t imagine Tj trying to text and call him but cyrus doesn’t want to answer

Don’t imagine cyrus trying to avoid Tj the whole day the next day

Don’t imagine when Tj finds cyrus at the swings but instead of him swinging he’s slouched on the swing crying into his hands

Just

Don’t

summary: from a to z, you and me
title: from a to z, you and me
body:
tyrus pen pal au!!  if enough people are interested in this first chapter i’ll write the rest of them :) 

Age 10 / Age 11

Dear Theodore,

I’m your pen pal, Cyrus Goodman!  I’m 10 years old and I’m in the fifth grade.  I like dinosaurs and baby taters.  I have dark brown hair and dark brown eyes.  I’m Jewish!  My favorite subject is Science, what’s yours?  My parents are psychologists, which means they get paid to tell other people how they feel.  My best friends are named Buffy and Andi.  Who are you friends with?  What grade are you in?

Hope to get a letter from you soon!

Cyrus Goodman

~

Dear Cyrus,

My name’s actually TJ.  My teacher just makes me go by Theodore when I have to take tests and stuff.  I have blond hair and green eyes and I am not Jewish.  My favorite subject is History because I like learning about all the cool things that happened before the Internet existed for people to get information from.  I have two friends named Lester and Reed.  My mom works for an insurance company and my dad does something with business.  He’s away a lot.  I have a sister named Amber too.  Oh, and I’m 11 years old.  And I love basketball.  Why are you doing the pen pal exchange?

TJ

~

Dear TJ,

History is cool!  My favorite thing to learn about is the Ancient Greeks!  I’m athletically impaired so I do not like sports.  I’m doing the pen pal exchange to get better at writing.  My teacher says I lack some creativity and she thinks I would develop better skills by writing to someone.  Why are you doing it?

I live in Shadyside.  Where do you live?

Cyrus Goodman

~

Dear Cyrus,

Did you know the Ancient Greeks created democracy?  That’s what class was about this week.  I’m doing the exchange because I like the idea of talking to someone I’ve never met.  That way they have to learn about me from me and not others.  

I live in Turtle Creek.

TJ

~

Dear TJ,

What do you think I would think about you if I learned from others?

Cyrus Goodman

~

Dear Cyrus,

I dunno.  I have stuff.

TJ

~

Dear TJ,

Me too.

Cyrus Goodman

~

Cyrus Goodman is 10 years old and he thinks he has a new best friend.  Not that anyone could be better than Buffy and Andi, but he thinks this new friend might be getting close.  TJ is his pen pal for English class and they’ve been writing letters to each other for a month now.  TJ is funny and he makes a lot of great jokes and tells Cyrus interesting stories.  He’s also in the sixth grade which means he’s just the slightest bit more mature than Cyrus.  He loves talking to him.

He knows that TJ lives in Turtle Creek, which is only a 26-minute drive from Shadyside.  His parents, however, don’t want to take him for a playdate with someone he hasn’t talked to in person yet.  So in his last letter, he asked TJ for his phone number so they could call each other and let their parents set up for them to meet.  He’s been anxiously waiting ever since.

They’re sitting in English class and he’s basically bouncing in his seat as Mrs. Rothschild starts handing out their letters.  Buffy lays a hand on his shoulder with a laugh.

“Cy!  Relax!  You’ll get it soon enough.”  Buffy is acting cool, but Cyrus knows that she’s just as anxious as he is to read her letter from Marty.  Andi gives him a goofy look as she looks over her letter from Jonah.  Cyrus is basically vibrating as Mrs. Rothschild finally lays his letter down on his desk and he tears into it.

Cyrus,

I always liked Franklin more than Spongebob, but my mom says that’s just because we live in Turtle Creek.  And thanks for asking about basketball!  I played my first game last week and it went really well!  I even made three baskets!  Math was gross as usual but Reed let me copy his homework (don’t tell my teacher.)  

Mom says I’m allowed to give you my number!  I’m really excited to hear what you sound like.  

412-555-1947

TJ :)

“Yes!”  Cyrus jumps up in excitement.  Mrs. Rothschild fixes him with a pointed look and he sits back down sheepishly.  As he rereads the note his smile widens.  He knows in his stomach that he’s going to meet TJ soon.  He has to.

summary: requests
title: requests
body:
request edits and I’ll post them to youtube

Song+Characters/ship+ how long you want the video to be+ any special clips you want in/theme of edit

Send it to my ask box and I’ll make it! It takes a little bit to do it, but I will!

ALSO! You can request Harry Potter edits, along with certain disney movie ones.

summary: I spend my whole life moving forwards, but understand it looking back Like watching last night's tapes in the middle of a game I...
caption:
I spend my whole life moving forwards, but understand it looking back
Like watching last night’s tapes in the middle of a game
I should know how this thing works now, I should accept it as a fact

Just My Luck // Dawes

It’s for Harry Potter/Andi Mack/And other Disney show edits. Leave request in the comments, Songs+Character/ships.

My first two videos:

Based off I tumblr post I can’t find

idk y but most of the quotes are off by a few seconds and it’s annoying…

Anyways go subcribe!

summary: look me in the eye and tell me this boy is not listening to this, right now LOOK ME IN THE EYE
body:
look me in the eye and tell me this boy

is not listening to this, right now
